TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F. Austin to James Holloway, 02-27-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: James Holloway to Austin, February 27, 1825. Receipt for $40 for freighting.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1052

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*James Holloway to Austin, February 27, 1825. Receipt for $40 for freighting.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"* Stephen F. Austin
*p*To *person_mentioned*James Holloway Dr*/person_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1825">1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*To hawling the following articles from *location_mentioned*Nachitoches*/location_mentioned* to the *location_mentioned*Brazos River*/location_mentioned* 1 Trunk—1 Keg—and 2 Boxes—$40.00*/p* *p*Recd, payment in full *date_mentioned n="02-27-1825">Feby 27 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned* James Hollaway*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
